game.name: Rocky Idle
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Rocky Idle is a single-player idle/incremental game. Level up your skills, gather resources, and craft powerful combat gear to defeat the strongest bosses and complete your collection log.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rocky Idle is a single-player idle/incremental game. Level up your skills, gather resources, and craft powerful combat gear to defeat the strongest bosses and complete your collection log.
